s: At Butterball, we make turkey products to help people pass love on. Find your recipe and choose your ingredients to make moments big and small come to life.

January 3, 2025 - Butterball’s all-new Hearty Turkey Sausage Links come in two flavors – Old World Smoked Sausage & Polish-Style Sausage. This turkey sausage brings the satisfying coarse ground texture of a bratwurst, but with 70% less fat* than traditional pork sausage.

December 6, 2024 - Butterball is a brand of turkey and other poultry products produced by Butterball LLC. The company manufactures food products in the United States and internationally—specializing in turkey, cured deli meats, raw roasts and specialty products such as soups and salads, sandwiches, and entrées.

October 5, 2022 - We're all about providing great-tasting food that brings people together and helps them pass love on. Learn more about us, from the Butterball® Turkey Talk-Line® to Our Purpose and other corporate information.

March 26, 2025 - Headquartered in Garner, N.C., Butterball is one of the largest producers of turkey products in the U.S. – producing approximately 1 billion pounds of turkey each year. For more than 60 years, the company has provided foodservice and retail products to customers and consumers around the world.

s: Butterball is a truly iconic American brand, part of dinner table traditions for families since 1954. Today, after nearly 70 years in business, the revered company still has a sole focus on turkey, ensuring its products are consistent, healthy and responsibly produced.
